entities: International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
summary:
The Security Council, 
Taking note of the Secretary-General's letter and the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda's President's letter, 
Recalling its resolutions 955 (1994), 1503 (2003), 1534 (2004) and 1966 (2010), 
Noting the redeployment of judges and the Tribunal's closure, 
Urging the Tribunal to expedite its work, 

1. Decides Judge Bakhtiyar Tuzmukhamedov may work part-time and engage in another judicial occupation until 31 December 2011, 
2. Underscores this authorization is exceptional, not a precedent, and the Tribunal President must ensure compatibility with judicial independence and impartiality, 
3. Decides to remain seized of the matter
